vidis.util.graphs.graph.algorithm
Class AugmentNetworkFlow

java.lang.Object
  vidis.util.graphs.graph.algorithm.NetworkFlow
      vidis.util.graphs.graph.algorithm.AugmentNetworkFlow
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AugmentNetworkFlow
extends NetworkFlow

Class that provides a flow on a Network and maximizes it by augmentation paths using the algorithm of Edmonds and Karp.

Version:
1.0 2002-10-12
Author:
Ralf Vandenhouten
See Also:
Serialized Form

          Adjacency matrix storing the capacities of the edges.

          Flow matrix storing the flow of the edges.

          Array for storing the edge type (true=forward, false=backward) for each edge during augmentation search.

Method Detail

maximizeFlow

public void maximizeFlow()
Method for finding a maximum flow in the network. The method uses the algorithm of Edmonds and Karp by iteratively searching augmenting paths.

Specified by:
maximizeFlow in class NetworkFlow
